roleset.name: to affect with or be affected by thrombosis
roleset.note: THROMBOSE-V NOTES: Adjectival 'thrombosed' found in medi-seedcorpus. (from thrombose.01-v)
THROMBOSED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from thrombosed.01-j)

role.descr: Causer of thrombosing (not sure this is possible)

example.name: thrombose-v: Arg1
example.text: His right internal jugular vein thrombosed when Dr.Q ballooned it, and she broke up the clot with thrombolytics while the patient was on the table.

example.name: thrombosed-j
example.text: There is a large left popliteal aneurysm which-1 [*-1] is thrombosed .
